reviews_data.review_text: It’s one thing to have just amazing customer service all the time. it is another to have that and SPECTACULAR, AMAZING,FLAWLESS DRINKS! Everything about this place is great. REBA AND LISA ARE THE BEST!!!!! Will be back tomorrow!

Neat spot with great coffee. I got a coquito latte and it was perfectly balanced, not too sweet with lovely hints of nuttiness and spices. I also appreciate the mix of seating available, tables, high tops, lounges. If I lived in town, I'd definitely make it a regular spot.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you, we appreciate your support and glad you enjoyed your latte.  We hope to see you again on your next trip back to Charlotte.

reviews_data.review_text: Great coffee and loving the new drinks!
Cute atmosphere but drinks are overly priced and not tasty
reviews_data.owner_answer:
Hi N.B,
Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We’re sorry to hear that your experience didn’t meet your expectations. We strive to provide both a welcoming atmosphere and drinks that reflect the care and quality we’re passionate about.
We would appreciate the opportunity to learn more about your experience and make it right. If you’re open to it, please reach out to us at Customerexperience@indigocote.com so we can address your concerns and hopefully have the chance to serve you again.

Thank you for visiting us and sharing your thoughts.

Best regards,
Indigo Management Team

reviews_data.review_text: Very nice and cozy spot. My daughter loved her hot chocolate. Try the matcha! We will be coming back for our book club meetings.
reviews_data.owner_answer: We truly appreciate you sharing your feedback with us.  It means a lot to hear that you enjoyed your drinks.  We strive to provide a positive experience for every customer.  Thank you for your support and we hope to see you again soon.  Your kind words encourage us to continue improving.

reviews_data.review_text: Super chill, super interesting latte menu (came in for a cold brew but was enticed by house made flavors), really positive atmosphere. Plenty of seating that was actually comfortable - a rarity for coffee shops these days, especially in charlotte. Great place to sip and work on a friday!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Hi Jared, We’re so happy you enjoyed the vibe. Our team works hard to create a warm and inviting space, and it means the world to hear that you appreciated it. We hope to see you again soon!

reviews_data.review_text: The banana bread latte tastes surprisingly good, refreshing and not artificially sweet

A Calm, Creative Café Worth Returning To

I met a friend here for a meeting and was immediately blown away by the decor. The space gives off an instant sense of calm and, for me, it sparked motivation. After the meeting wrapped, I ended up staying until close to get some work done—and it was the perfect atmosphere for it.

Most cafés can be a little noisy or distracting, but Indigo had just the right hum of productivity, balanced with couples and families coming in for coffee and a snack. During my visit, I had a delicious mocha latte, paired with a blueberry muffin that was moist and satisfying.

Since I stayed so long, I decided to try something else from the menu and ordered an iced fruit tea and it completely surprised me. It was the perfect level of sweetness, super refreshing, and included fresh fruit in every sip. Honestly, I’d go back just for that tea.

Indigo Coffee and Tea has officially been added to my list of go-to work spots. It’s a peaceful, creative space that makes it easy to focus while still enjoying the energy of a well-loved café. I’ll be back.

This was my first visit to Indigo and it’s an understatement to say that I thoroughly enjoyed the atmosphere, the specialty coffee (I had the Coquito 😋), and the customer service! We are definitely coming back!!
We tried the bourbon vanilla lattes and they were so good! The staff was so nice and the ambiance was very chill

Coffee 100/10
Owner & Staff so nice & helpful!
Ample Space to work or just converse with friends
My new go-to Coffee spot in Charlotte
Great Barista, great Americano. I’ll be back!

Indigo is amazing!!! From the atmosphere,  music, customer service and especially the drinks!! My go to Tea and Coffee spot now!!

My favorite  right now is Carmel Cookie but the Strawberry Shortcake is good too! Get them both😁

Free🤎~

review_questions.Seating type: Indoor dining area, Bar area, Outdoor patio / terrace

reviews_data.review_text:
I love trying coffee shops and sitting in them all day to do work. @indigoclt did not disappoint with the vibes, eclectic seating and shoutouts to the music, games and television for entertainment!
The best part about this new shop is that it is black owned in a highly sought area of #charlottenc
Order:
• -Iced Almond Milk Matcha
- Iced Banana Bread Oatmilk Latte w/ cinnamon

review_questions.Group size: 1 person, 2 people, 3-4 people, 5-8 people, Suitable for all group sizes
review_questions.Parking options: Free parking lot, Free street parking

reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for your kind words! We’re so glad you loved the drinks and service. We truly appreciate your support and can’t wait to welcome you back for another great visit!

reviews_data.review_text: Love this coffee shop! The owner & staff are very friendly & gave great recommendations. I got the coquito iced latte with oat milk & lovedddd it! I believe it's seasonal but I truly enjoyed every sip of it. The atmosphere is very nice too, very cozy. They have lounging chairs or hightop tables, candles on some of the tables, and music playing in the background. Definitely nice to do some work, or meet up with friends.

Such a cute spot with amazing coffee! We ordered the caramel cookie latte and the banana bread latte. Both with oat milk! The flavor was perfect! The owner, Reba made our order with a smile and provided great recs while ordering. We love a small coffee shop vibe. There was plenty of room to work as well. No doubt we will be back.
reviews_data.owner_answer: We’re thrilled you enjoyed your experience, and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

reviews_data.review_text:
My food review is based off of coffee — I didn’t have a pastry during this trip.

I did, however, have the best decaf Cardamom Fig latte (which Reba — the owner— ground for me fresh). The quality of my drink was exceptional and the service was impeccable.

Indigo Coffee & Tea is located inside Alongside Brewing and the vibes are soothing. From the playlist and artwork to the furniture in the space and the lighting, this little coffee spot hidden near the heart of  Charlotte is a nice place to meet with friends, work solo, or just hide away.

Parking is limited to keep that in mind, however, it’s worth the stop!
